name: Snaptrak 3D
description:
Hello 

It's the story of Snaptrak. You can view in Mims Quest or temple chest ,Thyzael legend ,Benland and island reload. You must fight him in a new battle card where you must equip the heros  with shield, hat and a sword ( you can find it in a shop in the city ) for use attack card and you can use the magic card too. Integral complete Free game...

Page up and page down for switch 2D or 3D view. Q key for switch the position of 3D view. Arrows panesl is more easy than the mouse, but you can use twice.

Good luck!!
